Description: When using Wyvern Style, you can use a whip to force an enemy to focus on you.
Prerequisites: brawler's flurryACG class feature or flurry of blows class feature

Name: Wyvern Wing
PrerequisitesString: Exotic Weapon Proficiency (whip), Wyvern Fury Style, Wyvern Sting, Acrobatics 10 ranks, brawler's flurryACG class feature or flurry of blows class feature
Description: Make an additional 5ft step between attacks when using Wyvern Style
Prerequisites: brawler's flurryACG class feature or flurry of blows class feature
